dcterms:description: A large-scale land cover classification dataset consisting of 150 Gaofen-2 imageries, annotated in five land cover categories: built-up, farmland, forest, meadow, and waters. It presents rich diversity in spectral response and morphological structure, making it suitable for model training and performance evaluation.
dcterms:title: Gaofen Image Dataset (GID)
